sentences.sContent: Back in Maine, I began thanking Scott if he threw one dirty shirt into the hamper.
sentences.sContent_eng: Back in Maine, I began thanking Scott if he threw one dirty shirt into the hamper.
sentences.sCn: 回到缅因州，要是斯科特把一件脏衣服丢进衣物篮我就开始感谢他。

sentences.sContent: He said the citizen from Georgia had as much right to settle in this territory with his slaves as a citizen of Maine with his horse.
sentences.sContent_eng: He said the citizen from Georgia had as much right to settle in this territory with his slaves as a citizen of Maine with his horse.
sentences.sCn: 他说，缅因州的公民有权带着他们的马进入新的领土，同样，乔治亚州的公民有权带着他们的奴隶进入这一新领土。

sentences.sContent: Almost half of the electricity generated by Maine comes from renewable sources.
sentences.sContent_eng: Almost half of the electricity generated by Maine comes from renewable sources.
sentences.sCn: 缅因州产生的将近一半的电力来自于可再生能源。

trans.tranCn: 缅因州(美国东北角的州)
